item.title: Fix 'Please wait while the document is being preared for' message in Adobe Reader
item.description: Any business user is familiar with the odd-ball errors that Adobe Reader can throw you while working. In this quick knowledgebase article, I’ll outline a quick fix I’ve found that works for me.

item.title: Fix mapped drives not showing in Open and Save dialogues in Windows
item.description: Problem User’s mapped drives do not show up as mapped in application Open/Save prompts, even though they show correctly in File Explorer > This PC.
